SocketClient - Class in client
Extends the Client class Generated when the user wants to communicate with socket Client-Server communication performed through socket TCP connections
SocketClient() - Constructor for class client.SocketClient
constructor of SocketClient
SocketControlPlayer - Class in controller
Receive requests from the SocketClient in order to perform game's actions
SocketControlPlayer(String, ArrayList<Stream>) - Constructor for class controller.SocketControlPlayer
Assign player id Initialize score Set player status as NOT_MY_TURN
SocketLobby - Class in controller
Receive the request from the SocketClient
SocketLobby(Lobby, Socket) - Constructor for class controller.SocketLobby
SocketLobby is responsible for all the requests coming from the client, it receives a JSONObject then execute the parsing of the Object's fields in order to individuate the action invoked by the client with the respective parameters, then invokes the method on the Lobby through the lobby attribute The constructor assigns the two parameters lobby and socket in order to execute request from the client on the server and sending/receiving data from the client through the Socket The input/output streams are abstracted with a Stream object which contains all method and attribute that enable the communication between client and the server over the network

startServer() - Method in class controller.TCPHandler
This method is always listening requests of connection from the clients It implements a server-socket functionality When a client try to connect to a server it creates a new socket then it creates a new SocketLobby linked to the client through the socket just created The threads are cached into CachedThreadPool It necessary in order to create a client-server connection via socket
